messages.message:
Hey, the delete all classes button sits behind the close button for editing a field. I regularly double click because of slight UI delays and so far I have never clicked to delete all classes (thankfully). Now we have a big POV project I'm becoming increasingly worried that I'm going to hit delete all classes and lose the project (I don't think we have a way to undo this).

Maybe we want to move the delete all classes button to a less commonly accidental click location?
Agree, and another thing that could add piece of mind (and which might already be implemented) would be a confirmation popup if the "delete all classes" button is pressed.
yeah we definitely already had a confirmation popup for these kind of dangerous actions
and at least in the case where autosave is off, the user can click “cancel” to not save those changes
